reviews.text:
This park will take your breath away! It is indescribable in its beauty and magnificence. We spent hours there just in awe of such a unique place. There is nowhere in the world to compare it to that we know of. Do not miss this under any circumstances
Well this place is nicely located, and is massive in area covered. I had gone on week day here and found , number of elephants made of stones were much more then tourists.

Great and big place to explore on ticket. You will get beautiful shots if you are photogenic. Get here with with your family and spent some beautiful time together. Parking is available but it is just opposite to park and you have to walk or cross the lane to move from parking to main park.
Opens 10 am and entry close to 7 in evening.

Awesome place to hang out in Lucknow. 
Great Artwork carved in stones.
Perfect for portrait photos .
Best time to visit here is an hour before sunset.
Night view is better than the daylight .
Peaceful environment .
Located near fun republic mall.

Visited this place at night, and I recommend everyone else to do the same. The lighting, the architecture and the entire atmosphere is amazing. I absolutely loved it. I think I roamed around the place for couple of hours just enjoying the view and peacefulness of the place.

It was a great place to come and unwind/relax after a long day of busy Lucknow.

This place is truly made for the instagrammer. This park has various spots for photoshoot. It has awesome views. Management was good and cleanliness was there. The best part is the entry fee, just 15 rs. is totally value for money. Must visit place in Lucknow.

Cutting 1 star in rating because there were no facility of drinking water or we hadn't found it. For such a big park, there must be 3-4 places for water.

The botanic gardens are beautiful! Very well kept. I enjoyed the greenhouses too, such a variety of lovely plants. I can tell a lot of care goes in to looking after them. I wish there were some animals in the tropical house. Nice for an afternoon stroll.

Really blissful ..you can have a good walk here.
of course when the weather is good.. 
You can see a wide variety of flowers.. well maintained.

The Ulster museum at one corner for the park is definitely worth a visit...& there is no entry fee.
Wonderful gardens, and amazing hot houses. Beautifully set out.  And with the Ulster Museum on the grounds. Amazing.  All lovers of plant life, and Creation in general will enjoy time spent here.

Had a great day walking around the craft fair. Seen many spectacular flowers, massive vegetables and lots of stalls selling home made produces. The fudge was fantastic.

Found the Belfast ukelele jam group playing in a marquee. Wow great music.

Pleasant in the early Spring. The flowerbeds are full of vibrant colour. The hothouses are rich with blooms and scents. The lawns have not yet shaken off their winter rough and are damp, but not for long. The renovated tropical ravine is superb and the museum is nearby if it rains or you need a snack. If it's sunny, go and look at the herbacious borders; sit and listen to the bees at work.

very interesting and memorable please roam around in the park has the various facilities like loans and chairs to sit down their and there are some ways to walk inside the park and find out the nature more closer than it is

Very nice park with boating facility for 30 per person, entry fee 10 per person, as they charge entry fee so you won't face unnecessary crowed except some festival or some peak hours in weekends. Good place for family and kids.
Its a kind of masterpiece developed in huge area of land with lush greenery and peaceful landscapes

Entry fees @10 ₹ per adult
Boating fees @30₹ per adult
Refreshment available canteen here
Good maintainence
Good for kids.
Nyc place for evening time to enjoy this place and play small games and boatings etc .

A historic place in the city. Good for a day out. But don't expect too much. Not too beautiful aur exquisite things to be seen. The decorations look cheap. It is well maintained and clean. Guides are there. Ticket need to be bought.

Imambara Hussainabad Mubarak nice place to visit. U will find out the burial of Muhammad Ali Shah..

The compound of Imambara consists of innumerable good architecture which was made very scientifically..

Very beautiful and we'll maintained place.

Peaceful atmosphere and amazing artwork, these are the two things that's stuck me here when visiting Lucknow. Although not as big and grand as Bara Imambara, this place has a different type of charm. Everything is more personal, artsy and cozy here, compared to its bigger sister.

Nicely maintained historical site. The lane leading to this place gets very crowded during local festival days, so plan your visit accordingly.
Architecture is worth appreciating. Can visit with kids, not recommended on a hot weather day.
Very quiet, peaceful place. Some of the artefacts are well preserved. Guide there was very helpful. No one demands money
Nice place to hang out with family. Wing 1 of course. Wing 2 for the love birds. Come along with food. Find a shaded place and talk for hours

This is a fun site to observe reptilian fauna. You may be disappointed if you're a big time wildlife explorer, as the park only has a modicum of Crocs, Alligators and just a couple of turtles, but yet, even if you have a slight affinity for animals, the park can be a relaxed weekend stroll. I wouldn't recommend it as a priority if you're visiting Lucknow on a hasty schedule, but it is great for a casual breeze or to feed your animal watching cravings. The area is totally clean, safety is taken care of well. Enjoy! #Lucknow #Wildlife #Reptiles #Parks

One of the places to go on a conventional picnic. It has nice open spaces to sit and relax. Some crocs enclosure to see them in person. Carry basic stuff as it doesn't fancy eateries. Best time to visit is winter season.

Having such place around is a great pleasure. The place is safe. Huge number of ghadiyal and number of crocodiles and many Variety of birds living around water can be observed in the park. Area is good for conversation with nature. Kids will enjoy more. There is a narsary just before the entrance. It has many Verity of plants and birds. Parking and toilets are available. No availability of public transport but Ola or Uber is available. But there is a problem of canteen. So getting refreshments is little difficult.
There is a very nice park. And comfort is abundant. Gharial and crocodile are also seen here.

Tallest in India this clock tower looks very beautiful. Every evening you can see many activities in and around clock tower. Small kids will definitely enjoy this place. And for young student there is many things to study. Also a heaven for photographers as you can see many pics.

Nice and we'll maintained plaza with a beautiful clock tower. You can recognise this monument from many miles away.

Clean and well taken care of plaza around the clock tower were a surprise. Many small electric toy vehicles there for the entertainment of your kids, nice.

I really enjoyed my time in Lucknow and this place was one of the memorable ones!

The iconic clock tower in Lucknow was constructed by the Husainabad Trust in 1881... Since then, it has seen major transformations but the soul of the clock tower is still the same.. The area near the clock tower was revamped by the district administration few years before... It is one of the top spots for outing for locals as well as tourists...

Really adorable place
Picnic spot passtime spot
People interested in history can also visit picture gallery situated adjacent to the premises.
To spend time there you will find food stalls, vendors and many swings too.
Teens are found playing cricket and others sports.
A huge pond is also there which is attractive and you can rest with your beloved one at the stairs of the pond
This clock tower is taller than the ones I've seen in other cities. Just a chill place to visit with family. Lots of open space & foot joints around to enjoy an evening walk.

Fantastic experience! A visit to our past. 1857 to be precise. Well maintained. The show at the residency was informative. If a person reads about it and then visits, it would be far more exciting. Do not miss the graveyard alongside the church.

The ruins of the British Residency bring to mind the war of 1857 in a way history books never can. The walk around was so serene and peaceful and the sprawling green lawns made me want to come back with a book to spend away afternoon lying down on the grass whiling away my time. Definitely a must see on your trip to Lucknow.

Good heritage property but it can be well preserved.  The cannon and the garden are very beautiful and earn enough attraction. The archeological center is located on an outdoor park. This is not just about any kind of business model. It carries the right amount of attention and earn enough respect.

The place has historic importance and is a good place to hang out with your gang. Avoid taking your kids there as you might encounter couples getting a little too close over here. Residency has a lot of places to capture in your camera. You can also go here if you wish to click photos of yourself among the ruins or the trees.

Good place for hangout... Not perfect but not bad... Can go.wothout any hesitation... Nice place... And good crowd...Kids also enjoyed a lot but only draw back not having good food joint.. so be prepare for that.. rake ample staff with you for your stomach.... Rest a great place

This park will take your breath away! It is indescribable in its beauty and magnificence. We spent hours there just in awe of such a unique place. There is nowhere in the world to compare it to that we know of. Do not miss this under any circumstances
Well this place is nicely located, and is massive in area covered. I had gone on week day here and found , number of elephants made of stones were much more then tourists.

Great and big place to explore on ticket. You will get beautiful shots if you are photogenic. Get here with with your family and spent some beautiful time together. Parking is available but it is just opposite to park and you have to walk or cross the lane to move from parking to main park.
Opens 10 am and entry close to 7 in evening.

Awesome place to hang out in Lucknow. 
Great Artwork carved in stones.
Perfect for portrait photos .
Best time to visit here is an hour before sunset.
Night view is better than the daylight .
Peaceful environment .
Located near fun republic mall.

Visited this place at night, and I recommend everyone else to do the same. The lighting, the architecture and the entire atmosphere is amazing. I absolutely loved it. I think I roamed around the place for couple of hours just enjoying the view and peacefulness of the place.

It was a great place to come and unwind/relax after a long day of busy Lucknow.

This place is truly made for the instagrammer. This park has various spots for photoshoot. It has awesome views. Management was good and cleanliness was there. The best part is the entry fee, just 15 rs. is totally value for money. Must visit place in Lucknow.

Cutting 1 star in rating because there were no facility of drinking water or we hadn't found it. For such a big park, there must be 3-4 places for water.

Too much cold,in theatre. Sound is pretty good. Not letting customers in, even before 30min for showtime is bad (in my opinion). Mall theatres are always great. Can expect everything that has to be in a cinema theatres except gaming consoles😅

Fun mall located in Avinashi Road. Very good place for watch movies with good sound system and ambient. Very nice under ground huge parking. Provided with lifts and escalators and emergency exits. Nice snacks center but too costly . Bus facility is very good. Maintenance is very good. Availability of Fire fighting system and first aid is remark able. Infrastructure is very good. Air conditioning is very good. The rest rooms are maintained well

Good seating and comfortable sounds system. The food and snacks are bit costly as you know it a common thing in every mall.  The booking counter is fantastic as they allow to see the available seat in the small monitor and make us to take decision to book the seats. The AC's we're also too good maintained a pleasant atmosphere

I really want decimal points for rating. I would definitely give a 4.4 for this theatre particularly. The screen and sound system is awesome. It is located in a mall so wonderfully placed at the top of the mall. I personally got a good 3D viewing experience in this theatre. But there's always room for improvement right they could increase one more screen and  sometimes they give more importance to local language films than other films.

A really good movie theatre in the area. I've always had good experience with them. As in every other theatres in shopping malls, the food here is overpriced that's the main reason for taking away one star. Though the food is overpriced, they taste pretty good. The location is clean and well maintained, the actual movie theatre, waiting area and the rest rooms.
Lacks place to sit and eat. Popular place for a quick bite but it is very crowded and you have to stand in queue for your meal. Pricing is okay but I wasn't really satisfied with the taste.

Not to much tasty the thing is only a name that differ from other . You should come in line to buy two price of Puri and sabji. There will be many more options available kindly visit there . This is not a right way to treat with customer or make a management in a proper manners. I think if  you have any other option kindly visit there.
Mouth watering delicious and authentic lucknowi street food. If you can stand in que and wait your turn then you get your food. The wait is worth it.
Awesome taste but no place to sit and eat tough to eat there better to pack and eat at your place. Zomato and swiggy is available there.
This is a place for super cheap breakfast of puri subzi . Although the place seems quite unhygienic , the food is super great and spicy beyond expectations . Must try place of Lucknow
It's a sweet shop on nakhas chauraha. An oldest and popular sweet shop in the locality. Famous for its delicious khoye k laddo
It's a place for you, if you are looking for an authentic taste in sweets of Lucknow. Once you tasted it then eating only one piece is never gonna be enough.
Amazing sweets that will melt through your mouth to stomach
Haji sweets shop is a best laddoo shop in lucknow
The oldest and finest test of lucknow

One of the most reputed places in Lucknow. And as far as my information it is the oldest shop of sweets in Lucknow. The places is very good but I think they should play more emphasis on advertisements as now it is decreasing its popularity.
A must visit place in LUCKNOW

Their speciality is the Malai paan, a sweet samosa with fillings, also try out the orange halva Wich is like marmalade they have branches
Their savory snacks are great too, liked the matri .
Sweets are amazing here you get all type of sweets and snacks out here and it's like more than 80 years establishment.

Nice n amazing varieties of sweets.one of the oldest sweet shops in Lucknow.relished the peda,lassi n gillori sweets.must visit when you are visiting Lucknow.malai ka paan  is an unique delicacy of Lucknow, should be tried!!!
Amazing sweet shop serving one of the almost extinct sweet Balai Gilhori (malai pan)

An absolute beauty in the heart of Lucknow city. One of the finest restaurant having it’s own shop-in area(though a little expensive). Their Maggie is a must try. And don’t forget to click beautiful Pictures!!! 😁

An amazing place with good ambience and decor. The interiors of the restaurant provide you with the royal touch. I would suggest one to visit this place during the evening when this place is all lightened up. Having explored the decor of the restaurant, we have ordered some dishes such as Margherita pizza which wasn't good at all. Nacho's with salsa dip wasn't good either as I was expecting it to be baked. Veg Manchurian and fried rice weren't either good. Thereafter, we ordered some shakes and cappuccino which tasted somewhat better than the rest of the food. I found servicing bit slower.. Needs improvement in terms of taste and presentation. Overall will say it was okay okay.
A place which is beautiful and scenic. Seating arrangement is good. Cooperative staff. Nice food. Bit over priced. They have rooftop also and dining inside as well. Well decorated
Ambience is great. Service is fast. A really good place to visit for spectacular photographs.

This place is one of the best Hangouts in Lucknow. Good food, good decor. This use to be a favorite place of ours to go and chill with friends during college. I have been visiting this place over a decade. Earlier the whole place as well as the parking area use to be very very spacious. 
Overall good place for good times!
Almost every kind of fast food is avaible. Midnight and Noon deals have special discount. Separate family sitting area. Play area for kids.
Delicious food. Must visit fast food chain of Bahawalpur. Their pizza is even good
If you love fast food and you are lahori... U may not like much... But this restaurant is much better than others in fast food
Service is a little bit slow. but taste is good. You can visit with your family and friends. A good palace for a meetup.

It's a fast food chain with variety of menu including pizzas, burgers and many more. Taste is an good. It's an economical restaurant. But staff have got problem with their attitude. Management needs to sort it out.
It was really good. better than Colorado springs McDonald's.. Everything was fresh thank you

The coke machine is always broken, service is crapy, and the wait is not worth the food. You could go somewhere for better food and get it faster. If you are in a rush go somewhere else, this place is not worth it. To top it all off it is not kid friendly anymore. They have electronic devices that don’t even work half the time. I went once and a baby got run over by a high chair. NOT kid friendly at all.
My weakness! Always a crowd but worth the wait. This location one of the cleanest for being so busy.
Wow looks really nice, so modern, good customer service and they have some good deals.

Nasty food..filthy restaurant .. I am so fed up with the sorry excuse for customer service. I came in today and ordered chicken nuggets, no dipping sauce but 2 packs of mayo, they charged me for the mayo, then tried to give me someone elses food. after they handed my food to the car in front of me, they gave me the same food without replacing it. This place is a horrible location. I will never go back to this location. The sad thing is the owners could care less.

I love mint so I really loved this museum. It showed the history of the mint industry in Kitami and how the oil is extracted. They also showcase different kind of mints and displays lots of mint related products.
Great place to learn about the mint- making process! The factory was really cool! If there was information in English it would be great!

ハッカについて説明してくれる方がいてわかりやすかったです。
施設は建物が２棟。古いですが西洋風の建物で素敵です。お土産が少し置いてあって、ハッカ飴や、ハッカ豆など試食もありました。
観光に、30分あれば十分見れる感じです。

北見＝薄荷の歴史を知らずに北見観光の一環での訪問でしたが、行って良かったと思える所です。

【記念館】
10月の日曜日でしたがお客さんはまばらでした。ただ、そのおかげでスタッフさんに親切丁寧に庭先に植えられた原料も使いながら説明をしてもらいよく理解できました。
少し古めの展示も懐かしくていいです。

【蒸溜館】
お土産購入のつもりで入館。こちらの展示は少しですがこちらでも親切な説明があったり、お土産の商品一つ一つにもこれは･･･と笑顔で教えてくれました！

その後、２月の雪の季節にも訪問。前回より少ししか経っていなかったので中には入りませんでしたが、買ったハッカ油が切れたら、また必ず行きます！

北見(駅)で１時間半くらい時間があれば行くことをお勧めします。

ハッカ記念館は「薄荷」つまりミント工場の遺構ですね。最近は観光対応を強化したようで、進化した分、1ポイントアップしました。蒸留窯を見て何かに似ていると思った方、それは余市の工場を見学されていると比較できます。基本的にはwhiskeyの製造と同じです。実は江戸時代に灯油を精製した原理と同じです。ハッカの蒸留は工場で行われていただけではありません。ハッカ農家にも蒸留窯の遺物があったのを過去に見た事があります。ハッカ御殿については2017年のBS日テレ「北海道すたいる」という番組で紹介されていました。仁頃地区に現存しているらしいのです。アドヴィックス常呂カーリングホールへの通り道にあると思いますが、放送された木造家屋は私も見覚えがあります。
　蒸留により、水と精油に分かれると説明されると解りにくいのですが、水とアロマオイルに分かれると書くと何～んだ！という事になります。北見市では植物のミントを栽培していますから、高純度の合成ミントとは違った天然アロマオイルの良さがあります。ミントオイルは花粉症の時期には大活躍です。私もハッカのど飴のおかげで症状が緩和されましたが、花粉が目の粘膜に刺さるのは我慢出来ません。痛みは取れないですが、かゆみは出ませんからハッカは重宝ですね！
　＊＊ハッカ記念館は幸町の「ピアソン記念館」と同じ風ぼうです。比べると面白いです。関東地区でも放送がある「ブギヴギ専務」という番組で紹介されていました。＊＊

One of the best Pizza Huts in the area. First folks in so the buffet wasn’t completely out yet. Though the food that was, was absolutely delicious & hot. Staff was friendly & on top of things. Restaurant was pretty clean & well organized.
SO so ummy...and I love supporting young readers -- thanks, Hut! ...did I mention how very yummy the pizza was? Seriously. Good pizza 🥰
Love their pizza! It's the best anywhere. The service at this one is amazing, too!
Food was good and so was the service. Waitress was great also!
Pizza hut has been always the best pizza and love the salads and sauces. Great services as well.

Its just a famous spot. I don't find there tea that much attractive nor there food items. You can make better tea in your home just by adding some special ingredients which you can buy online or offline.
When you can have the same even better taste in your home then whats the need to go there and spend money on traveling?
Its just a spot where people go to have selfie, tag there friend, post online.
That place has become a symbol now

Tea and bun served here is awesome. Bun has extra amount of butter on it, that is what adds to its taste.
Parking facility is poor, since it's in the main market. Seating facility is not available too, one has to stand and eat.
Although a good place for foodies during morning and evening time.

Its an old shop hence the popularity. The tea is very average. Raw Bun and butter is the other famous thing here. Good thing is tgat they use white fresh made butter. Their round samosa are unique and a must try.
Must visit place in Lucknow. Very famous and busy. Visit in the morning, have a break fast there. Try a very unique combination of bun butter with tea.

Quality of tea is good. It is nice to visit the place and spend time here. Although there is large rush for tea, samosa and bread-butter here, the service is quite fast. However, 'hygiene' is a concern here especially if one takes tea in glass, as they clean glasses only with simple water, without using soap.

An absolute beauty in the heart of Lucknow city. One of the finest restaurant having it’s own shop-in area(though a little expensive). Their Maggie is a must try. And don’t forget to click beautiful Pictures!!! 😁

An amazing place with good ambience and decor. The interiors of the restaurant provide you with the royal touch. I would suggest one to visit this place during the evening when this place is all lightened up. Having explored the decor of the restaurant, we have ordered some dishes such as Margherita pizza which wasn't good at all. Nacho's with salsa dip wasn't good either as I was expecting it to be baked. Veg Manchurian and fried rice weren't either good. Thereafter, we ordered some shakes and cappuccino which tasted somewhat better than the rest of the food. I found servicing bit slower.. Needs improvement in terms of taste and presentation. Overall will say it was okay okay.
A place which is beautiful and scenic. Seating arrangement is good. Cooperative staff. Nice food. Bit over priced. They have rooftop also and dining inside as well. Well decorated
Ambience is great. Service is fast. A really good place to visit for spectacular photographs.

This place is one of the best Hangouts in Lucknow. Good food, good decor. This use to be a favorite place of ours to go and chill with friends during college. I have been visiting this place over a decade. Earlier the whole place as well as the parking area use to be very very spacious. 
Overall good place for good times!

I have visited this Aryan many times. They have good food and best cold coffee. Good place to visit with friends and family. Some beverage has high cost and some normal with better service. Here you can pay cash or by card also
It is good for both family and couple. The restaurant provide good service and food. Overall it's a mid class range restaurant.
One of my favorite place to have lunch and dinner.. Fine dine
Lunch experience was nice , little bit costlier but no compromise with quality so it's a better option

Very bad experience.  Fried makkhi in chowmin plate and the paneer served to us was not fresh too. Wanted to give zero star. One review also states this insect incident i ignored that now I am regretting of ignoring that review.

As silver member got free upgrade to junior suite. One of the best suites i've been to. On 11 floor with balcony to the sea and great view on the city. Breakfast is also good with big variety. Recommend.
Awesome hotel. Really clean, well laid out rooms. The staff are all friendly, professional and helpful. Breakfast is amazing and the bar serves good food throughout the day. Highly recommend!

Very good location, clean rooms, very good breakfast.. There is a cosy lobby bar with friendly staff.
Fitness room is very small and hot water gets cold sometimes..
Location wise it gets all the 5 stars. Pretty clean. Friendly staff. Decent breakfast and lovely breakfast lounge. Ideally I would want a room with a view of the Caspian.
Stayed here for 1 night new years eve. Room was comfortable and clean. Located walking distance from the mall and restaurants
